document.full_text: winds are set to blow low-level radiation from japan's quake-crippled nuclear power plant out over the pacific ocean in coming hours, easing health worries after drifting toward tokyo early on tuesday, experts said.
document.title: japan wind change to blow radiation over pacific
lines_and_colors: winds are set to blow low-level radiation from japan's quake-crippled nuclear power plant out over the pacific ocean in coming hours, easing health worries after drifting toward tokyo early on tuesday, experts said.
